sub_title: Data Scientist at ABN AMRO Bank N.V.
summary:
I am a highly motivated and performance-driven Data Scientist with a passion for solving problems, working with data and developing my skills. My area of expertise revolves around predictive modeling, machine learning, and big data analysis. 

I am experienced in large-scale data analysis, model development and acquainted with the modern data stack, such as cloud-based analytics platforms  and PySpark. I have been involved in several projects that used a diverse set of algorithms, such as Tree Based boosting algorithms, Logistic and Linear Regression, Support Vector Machines, Neural Networks, and others, to extract insights from structured behavioural data.

I love collaborating with people and learning something new every day. When I am not doodling on my computer I spend my free time cooking, travelling and playing the guitar.
